reqs:
Pre-reqs: (Restricted to M.Mus. Conducting (Choral, Orchestral, Wind) or permission of the instructor.)
Please contact instructor for permission to register (jonathan.girard@ubc.ca). Class will meet in MUSC Room 324.
courseName: Seminar in Conducting and Repertoire I - ORCH COND&REP I
description: Advanced study of conducting techniques and of representative major compositions and literature (earlier historical periods). Emphasis on knowledge and conducting skills that can communicate a thorough understanding of genre, idiom, form, texture, and style, in rehearsal and performance.
